aadhar: extract name(should be string), date of birth(should be in DD/MM/YYYY) and aadhar number(should be a 12 digit number) from the given image in json format
pan: extract name(should be string), date of birth(should be in DD/MM/YYYY) and pan number(should be a 9 alphanumeric long) from the given image in json format
gate: extract name(should be string), gate score(should be a number) from the given image in json format
